> 
> Otyebis Soldiers:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> One of the two skimmers landed, the other staying airborne to 
provide air 
> support if needed.  The landed skinner opened a hatch in its side, a 
dozen 
> laser-rifle armed humanoid bipeds in gold and red pouring out and 
flowing to 
> Cliffjumper and Strafe, picking them up and loading them into the 
skimmer, 
> the craft rising and both IGL skimmers blasting off at full speed 
towards the 
> Otyebis.

::REDHOT::

    The red seeker was not happy to see the state of Cliffjumper and 
lept into action to help him but was cut off by the humanoids who 
carted the tiny red four wheeler away.
    'Hehe." he said suspitiously and followed them a short ways before 
stoping and returning back to his other, concernied allies.
    'what is the meaning of this!!??' he cried to anyone in listening 
distance. 'who let them run off with my FRIEND?' Then he realized h 
as the one and quickly lept to Cliffjumper's rescue.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
